scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Photostat of letter of transmittal and inventory; letter to Bishop Bernado del Espiritu Santo, transmitting an inventory of sacred vessels, mass vestments, and other valuables in the church of the Presidio of San Agustín of Tucson, Nov. 6, 1820. Accompanied by English translation made by Col. B. McKay Greeley.
